Description:
Our client is a leading Amusement Park company. They are now looking for an Administrator – Cash Control to join them. Roles & ResponsibilitiesOpening and/or closing of Ops Base offices and carry out daily tasks in line with operating checklists.
Ensure all Ops Base Radios are charged at start of day and ready for use before park opening.  
Maintain an accurate inventory of Radios and accessories at all times and take appropriate action for faulty/missing radios in compliance with the SOP. 
Records park opening/closing timing at start/end of day in conjunction with the park duty manager.Skills
Skills:
1 – 2 years of experience working as operations base, telephone operator or customer services in theme parks or hospitality.  
Previous experience in UAE / GCC countries.

College degree / High School Education or 1 & above years of experience working in theme parks in similar capacity. 
Fluent in English
Good Guest and Employee services skills
Proficiency in computer skills
